structure.unit: RELIGIOUS, CHARITABLE, AND EDUCATIONAL SOCIETIES -- NONSTOCK, NONPROFIT CORPORATIONS

law.catch_line: Conversion of Chapter 271B corporation to corporation governed by KRS 273.161 to 273.387.

text.section: A corporation organized under KRS Chapter 271B or its predecessors may convert to a corporation organized under and governed by KRS 273.161 to 273.387 as authorized by KRS 271B.10-010.
A corporation that has been converted under KRS 271B.10-010 shall be for all purposes the same entity that existed before the conversion.
Nothing in this section shall authorize the conversion of a corporation organized under this chapter to a corporation organized under KRS Chapter 271B.

law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 10, effective June 20, 2005.
